# Housden weight matrix
# Matrix showing the enrichment P values of each nucleotide
# in each position among high-efficiency sgRNAs.
# Trained on data from Drosophila mRNA injections
# Housden et al (2015) Figure S1B
# position	A	C	G	T
1	0.4979	0.4979	0.7918	0.6699
2	0.7959	0.6869	0.4461	0.5485
3	0.7553	0.8528	0.4851	0.275
4	0.6569	0.7643	0.4461	0.5972
5	0.9481	0.5325	0.3417	0.6212
6	0.7147	0.3417	0.6869	0.7555
7	0.437	0.3417	0.2417	1.0
8	0.6212	0.7643	0.5485	0.5131
9	0.9077	0.6434	0.0947	0.8608
10	1.0	0.0092	0.9256	0.7553
11	0.1957	0.9331	0.5325	0.6569
12	0.7959	0.5325	0.8308	0.3417
13	0.6212	0.7272	0.1255	1
14	0.8912	0.9708	0.7918	0.016
15	1.0	0.2905	0.2544	0.9146

18	0.5485	0.7918	0.6212	0.4979
19	0.455	0.6434	0.7918	0.5485
20	1.0	0.5062	0.4461	0.5131
